amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 118-4 to require a detailed description of any impact on the consumer price index.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Perry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
